long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LangBrowser - Learn a language while browsing and reading, a context vocabulary Builder help you "Learn Languages in Context"

Translate  and Save Word/ Sentence while you read any website. Powered by Google Translate, Glosbe.com.

- Learn Languages by reading whatever you like
- Translate words and phrases live on any webpage
- Highlight word to learn without practice
- Save and learn word and sentence in context
- Multiple dictionaries to learn 
- Multiple languages to choose
- More features coming soon

Right click and select Menu > Translate and Save
